A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Zero character development.  No interesting new planets/creatures except for the porgs which are only there to sell stuffed animals.  The casino planet served as nothing more than a way to dump on war and capitalism.  New characters (Rose and Holdo) are less interesting than cardboard.  Phasma and Snoke die without any fanfare.  Rey is suddenly a Mary Sue and Luke wants to burn old Jedi books\, but instead Yoda does it for him.  Kylo ren sulks and Poe and Finn are useless.  The battle at Crait was Hoth 2.0 nothing new to see here.
